      • include

        public java.lang.String include(java.lang.String path)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        The include method takes a path to a jsp that lives on the actual file system and parses it for inclusion in the velocity template. The user trying to call this method in content or widget must have "Scripting Developer" role in the CMS AND ENABLE_SCRIPTING must be set to true in dotmarketing-config.properties.
        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
